title: Error 0xc0000005
body: So occasionally, when entering a league game, after champ select I get an error code saying "Error 0xc0000005 the application was unable to start correctly, click OK to close the program." I'm not sure if this is exactly what it said, I'm just going off of what I remember. So when I click OK the reconnect screen comes up and when I click reconnect the error code keeps popping up. I have to shut everything down from my computer and restart is and when I open league back up I can play. This happens 8-9/10 times when i play a league game. I've searched on this before and I tried deleting the lol_patcher file but it says it's unable to delete. I tried finding a solution to this and it said "Go into AVG Protection, click advanced, then something about a file and stuff, but I can't find the advanced thing on my AVG protection, I was wondering if anyone would take their time to maybe skype me and let me share screens and guide me through it if possible. Thanks.

replies.body: I am getting the same thing now at random my last two games never have had the problem no updates or anything. And i get demoted and another loss on top of it. I tried submitting a ticket but no one responded. And none of my logs are update cause i have not been able to play a game. just two ranked losses in a row.

Hmm...this error message usually occurs in the Patcher, but it seems extremely rare that it is occurring after Champ Select.  In order to figure out what is exactly causing this error, we are going to need to dig pretty deeply into your network or computer configuration.  To that end, make sure to[ submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  One of our Tech Guru's should be able to help out and get this resolved.  Make sure to include the following info as well:

1) [DxDiag](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)

2) [Your latest R3d Log (check the date!)](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq7)

3) [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)

4) [Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)

5) [Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)
